items.sentence: As long as you live in my house, you\'ll follow my rules.
Do you have any idea how many people were at the concert?
I had trouble finding my way back to my hotel last night.
I have no desire to understand what goes on in your head.
I couldn\'t help but overhear your conversation with Tom.
I don\'t want to go through another experience like that.
Tom hid the gun under a bunch of oily rags in his garage.
Tom hoped the rain would stop before he had to walk home.
Tom is in a lot of pain, but he says that he can take it.
Could you write down the chord progression for this song?
